title: 47 Injured, Event Canceled as Mass Pile-up Shatters UCI Gran Fondo Belgium: ‘Broken Carbon and Bones Everywhere’
content:
Seven riders hospitalized Sunday after riders clash 8.5km in to Gran Fondo World Series event: 'It was not a pretty sight'

Read the full article at 47 Injured, Event Canceled as Mass Pile-up Shatters UCI Gran Fondo Belgium: ‘Broken Carbon and Bones Everywhere’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
